title: SKGLView rendered over MasterDetailPage [Android]
body:
Hi!!!

When i try to use the SKGLView with the MasterDetailPage the canvas is drawn over the Master page.
Currently i am using the MasterBehavior="Popover" behavior for the Master page.

The problem is present only on Android and it vanish if you start the application with the property IsPresented="True" in this case all works like a charm

Attached you can find the test project. In the test i am using Prism but the same problem is present also without it.
[TestSKGL.zip](https://github.com/mono/SkiaSharp/files/1443493/TestSKGL.zip)
